website_summaries.verdict: An incredibly strong pegboard by a top name in the industry – the competitors can't beat it's design, durability, or versatility for organizing numerous types of tools and more.
pros: A complete kit with 3 pegboards that total 10.5 sq
20-gauge steel construction is built to handle many heavy tools
Available in several powder-coated colored finishes, and comes with mounting hardware
cons: Some consumers didn't receive all three panels, but customer service was prompt to correct the issue

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Great product solid very happy with it. I was glad that I could buy this kit and I had to buy three more panels. In the picture attached I used 6 panels. If you found the review Useful, please click the HELPFUL button. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Gsam

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed. Wall Control need better quality control in the ...
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed. Wall Control need better quality control in the warehouse area. All three panels came damaged on multiple corners(Please see Pics) The Box came without a mark so I doubt it occurred in transit. The damage occurred after painting because the paint is chipped on the cracks. What is most upsetting is that someone packed these and shipped a damaged product. The product itself is good and after spending an hour with a rubber mallet and wood blocks I was able to straighten out the panels enough to mate on installation.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The Best Pegboard on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Organizing the garage - It's a Navy Tool Control thing. If it's not on the board, it's missing. Installed the Pigboard for the tools. Went with the stainless steel slat style pegboard slots that also works with the old style pegs on the round holes. Got four panels 36" x 16" Black panels with Black accessories. The whole board measures 36" high x 64" wide. Tools look like they are floating. This is heavy duty and not cheap. Comes in different colors (white, orange, yellow, galvined, red, blue, and black). Scratch resistant and easy to clean. You can mix and match colors for accessories. Easy to install and looks great. Wife loves it. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: You're paying alot for style
customer_reviews.text: It's really good quality and all, but it IS overkill. I've had mine for almost a year, and now that I need more pegboard space, I'm starting to regret beginning with this. You only get 10 square feet of pegboard space with every 3 panels. That means it's 10 bucks a square foot to go this route (accessories considered). I'm fighting the urge to buy more of this stuff so that everything matches because it's just so expensive, and if you use your pegboard wall properly, you're not even going to see that nice glossy powdercoat underneath all your tools. My suggestion: know yourself and think ahead before buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: On the fence if I'd ever buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Some panels come dented from shipping so you'll need to straighten them before mounting of they won't be flush to wall or each other. The attachments have serious burrs on them and so much overspray of paint you need to sand/file them down to get them just to fit in panel. These are a great idea but the little details of quality are sadly lacking. I bought 2 sets for some benches and while I like the way they will function the quality could stand to be improved. If anything the shipping box need better protection. Dented panels when opened means headache and time waste for installers.
customer_reviews.author: Jory Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for organizing tools in an artist studio
customer_reviews.text: I am a glass mosaic artist and needed a nice looking way to organize my art tools so that everything's right at hand... but also looks nice in an artist's studio (rather than a man's garage). I DO wish there were more accessories, especially for larger handle tools. But it's a good start for organizing your tools if you want something on your wall. The black color is really nice looking. My one real complaint? Some of the accessories arrived with the insert tabs crooked or bent. Not a big deal, I fixed them with a hammer. But hammering the pieces removes the black paint, so it's not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sewing/Craft Room!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect choice for pegboard organization in my new sewing/craft room. The shelves provide nice storage for sewing iron and accessory boxes, the long thin hooks are great for rolls of tape or ribbons. The small hooks offer a place to hang metal pails at the bottom of the board. Not only are do regular pegboard hooks and baskets work, there is the great option to use powerful heavy duty neodymium magnets to hang scissors, magnetic spice racks for large cone spools and my small drill, magnetic spice tins to store thread spools and a magnetic paper towel holder--all available on Amazon. I plan to add another wall unit later.
customer_reviews.author: byu

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: After decades of using wood pegboards I decided to spring for one of these metal units. Very happy I did! Installtion was very easy. The location where I installed it required attaching it to sheetrock, not studs, and the included mounting screws made this possible without having to buy additional hardware. The included mounting hooks for tools are so much better than the standard pegboard hooks that are commonly used. The metal will last a long time, and having a choice of colors is a very nice touch! Overall, this is a great investment and I can highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John Z

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install for a person who is not at all handy
customer_reviews.text: I actually assumed that I would need a handyman to install this, but I definitely did not. I was able to install this by myself, and I am not at all handy. I also wasn't able to hit all of the studs in my wall, but this comes with wall anchors that I used and that are very strong. It took me about 30 minutes to install this, but someone handier could probably do it quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount, very strong and functional
customer_reviews.text: I have never like "pegboard" because of it's fragility and general look. These panels are awesome! Strong, durable, and good looking! Super easy to mount and if mounting directly to wall, no "standoff" is needed. The included hooks are a great design and can be adjusted so they won't pull out when removing a tool. The shelves are very strong and the entire system is very functional. I am thinking about putting some elsewhere inside the house. The option of using regular pegboard hooks as well just increases the versatility of these panels.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall Tool Storage Unit
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool storage unit. Have a workbench in my basement with a toolbox, though not enough room for all tools. Plenty of items were just sitting loose on the workbench. Have a poured concrete wall behind the workbench. Perfect size for this wall unit. Instead of installing this directly on the poured concrete wall, I instead installed 3 1"x4" furring strips and then the wall until onto that. Works great & looks great! I also bought the extra set of hangers and have used about half of them so far. The picture I included shows the unit with tools, though I still have a few more tools and about 15 more hangers. Again, love this wall unit!
customer_reviews.author: Allen K

customer_reviews.title: Don’t worry about hitting the studs.
customer_reviews.text: It should be easy to install if you just forget about lining the holes up on studs. If you use all 3 panels you’re better off centering them where you want them and just use the included plastic drywall fasteners. I botched up my new drywall thinking that I had to hit a stud. If you are using all 3 panels the mounting holes simply will not line up on 3 studs. Contrary to the instructions you cannot drive 2 screws in one hole. It would be easier if it was one large panel and the mounting holes were 16 or 24 inches on center. Or the panels should overlap.
customer_reviews.author: RCL

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 was because the instructions could have been a little better. If you have tools that you need to organize then you probably are a little handy but you can't just throw these things up side by side and hope they work. They need to be spaced a part just a tiny bit. Oh, and don't just assume since you found the studs on the first one that you are going to end up on a stud every time, I guess builders aren't quite as consistent in some homes. Sometimes I just put one of the screws in at an angle and caught the stud. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: Better quality control needed
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat disappointed in the condition of the product. There seems to be a problem in the handling of the panels as every corner was bent as well as one shelf was bent to the point it was almost kinked. Assuming that you are somewhat particular since these are quite expensive compared to a peg board you may be disappointed. As far as installation.... easy, appearance when installed.... good, operation..... some hangers don’t sit as tight as others and might come loose as they do on a standard peg board. Overall I do like the appearance but feel for the cost you should expect the product to not have any damages. The shipping box did not have any damage.
customer_reviews.author: LAUREN LABONTE

customer_reviews.title: Great peg board alternative but standard pegs fall out easily
customer_reviews.text: I really like this as a peg board alternative but I feel their advertising about standard pegs working with it is misleading. They fit as displayed in their images, but they fall out easily and shouldn't be used with this. Unfortunately I bought a lot of standard pegs before I realized this, so that was an unnecessary headache. With that said, their proprietary peg system works great and I highly recommend it if you're only going to use those. Actually, the reason I'm writing this review is because I'm back to buy another after having one for the past year, I just won't be picking up any standard pegs this time around.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Solid product. As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and quality metal product. Installation was straight forward. Comes complete with screw anchors if needed. I feel the anchors could be of better quality, although recommended installation is on the studs. Elected to use my own self tapping anchors for easier installation. At this price they should be included as an upgrade. The accessories package was good. The plastic bins seemed a bit flimsy but serviceable. I would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I just moved into a new house and wanted to set up a workshop area in a corner of the garage. I didn't want the hassles associated with regular pegboard (furring strips, etc.). The Wall Control panels have a nice, finished appearance and go up quickly. I'll add 2 more vertical panels to this set and 2 horizontal panels on the adjoining wall (spaced around an electrical outlet). That should be enough to have all my hand tools handy.
customer_reviews.author: R. HurleyTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged but Customer Service Makes It Right
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time but the box was crushed on one side and consequently the panels edges are deformed making it difficult to mount. I like the quality of the product however and will ask for a replacemt. Update: I contacted the company and explained the problem. They were nice enough to give me a 50% discount at their site. Meanwhile my husband used a rubber mallet and a 2x4 to basically fix it and I have to say, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: SLA

customer_reviews.title: Performance and aesthetics
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this setup. Ended up buying a single panel to make it 4-wide. Very sturdy. One came slightly bent (damage to box also, I blame shipping, not the manufacturer) but with a few light taps with a rubber mallet and 2x4 it went right back to shape. Everyone that sees my workbench instantly asks about them. Look great and the hooks are phenomenal. Being able to adjust their tightness in the slots reduces rattle (metal on metal instead of a wooden pegboard) as well as keeping a night snug fit when pulling tools out. If I expand my bench in the future I will definitely look to Wall Control first.
customer_reviews.author: BParker

customer_reviews.title: In a class of its own
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other pegboard setups and been disappointed. Covid boredom got the best of me and I decided to re-work the bicycle maintenance corner of the garage and gave Wall Control a shot. I couldn't be happier with the product. It's sturdy and very well made - parts are cleverly designed and fit very well. This is gray boards and blue accessories, and the colors are even and downright beautiful. Greats stuff. Worth the modest premium over other solutions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to my garage
customer_reviews.text: Overall, very pleased with this organized. I didn’t want go to the wooden pegboard route again since it deteriorated pretty quickly. These metal panels are very sturdy and look extremely clean when installed. The only negative is plastic peg hooks will not fit perfectly and you’ll need to either deal with them being loose or order additional metal hooks. The other nice feature is the width which matches up with my home’s studs. Made installation a snap.
customer_reviews.author: C Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not for industrial applications but makes a good organizer for most garages
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Just a place to get some of my tools and such organized and handy. Extremely easy to hang, get one panel level and the rest handle themselves. Has a nice assortment of hooks and shelves so you don't have to go out and buy a bunch of accessories to make it useful. For $100 I couldn't be much happier with it. Made my garage much more organized and look better too!
customer_reviews.author: Preston Family est. 2006Top Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: All three sheets are damaged on the corners. Bent...I tried to upload pics but it won't let me do that. It won't let me post a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Despain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product BUT...!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the new set of pegboard for the garage and received "used" one. I know this because when I opened the box, the manual was out of the place and had two of the same manual on one side and another manual for another installment on the other side. Most importantly, I am missing some of the items that must be included. One of the larger hooks (shown in the center board of image) is missing, and the glasses that go in front of the nail holders? to hold the name papers are missing. I don't understand why I am receiving an used package with parts missing. Should you receive all the items, it's a hot item.
customer_reviews.author: Kyu

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic solution for quick organization
customer_reviews.text: There’s nothing fancy about this system. For the cost you can’t beat it. You could go to a hardware store and buy pegboard and frame it to mount it on the wall but there’s an opportunity cost there. This system was easy to install (six drywall anchors and screws per sheet), and the hooks are all tight and sturdy. My once disheveled garage is now organized enough for anyone to find what they need quickly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Must have for great organization
customer_reviews.text: I got this to hang in my office at work. I'm an engineer and got tired of tinkering with stuff at my desk so i build a new one and used this to hang all of my tools. It looks very professional so i can still have people in my office and it looks great rather than cluttered. Quality of the hooks are decent. Each one takes a little adjustment with a pliers to prevent them from having a slight wobble. Only necessary if you are nit picky.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA, very well  packaged
customer_reviews.text: I've installed two sets of these metal pegboards in my workshop. Lots of pros, no cons: many color choices; they include several fixtures and cubbies, but you can order them without to save money; very, very well packed. 1/4" pegs work best; 1/8" pegs tend to flop around - no fault of the pegboard.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Looks Awesome and Very Practical
customer_reviews.text: This pegboard was exactly what I wanted right down to the colors. Durable well made metal and very practical. The size was perfect for my needs although if my workshop grows I can see purchasing some additional boards and accessories. I tacked the pegboard up on my concrete wall and it sits secure and stable. Very happy with this purchase and this has become the centerpiece to my growing workshop.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Got this bad boy installed in about 15 minutes. Works well for what I need in my work bench area. Was a bit smaller than expected but I would have known that if I measured prior so I had to purchase an extra panel. The shelves are easy to install and I like them. I am not a huge fan of the hooks that come with them but I bought some other normal pegboard hooks from Home Depot and they work great. Straightened up my workbench area and now I have all the room I need.
customer_reviews.author: Justin H.

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: The pegboard kit arrived intact, but there was only one bag of six screws. To be complete, I needed 18 screws to attach the three pegboard panels to the wall. This might not seem like a huge deal, but now I have to run to the hardware store, to buy what should have came with the entire kit. I am wondering now what else is missing. I would return this just due to principle, but I am not going to hassle with that, over 12 missing screws. The pegboard panel I did mount does seem sturdy enough, and I think that I will be happy with my purchase. Time will, and always will tell...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Berkenmeier

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I would have given it 5 stars but all 3 panels had a banged up corner that I had to bend out with a pair of pliers to make it sit flush. I could’ve returned them but I didn’t want to wait so I just installed them. Easy to install and obviously a quality made product. I will buy again but I hope they improve the packaging to protect the panels.
customer_reviews.author: DaveQ

customer_reviews.title: looks better that it actually is....
customer_reviews.text: While it looks great, the hooks do not fit smoothly into the slots. Once the hooks and accessories are installed - they are very difficult to remove. The most useful hooks are the medium but only 3 are included in the package. the small hooks are almost useless as they really should be called micro hooks, since hand tools are too thick to be used with these hooks and as a result the don't hang vertically. The bottom line is that it very sturdy, but additional hooks are pricy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this for my father and he loved it! There's different attachments and many ways to fit to your liking (and I liked the color choices). I was able to arrange his work area so he can manage it as know where all his stuff is located at a glance. The other great part is that if more accessories are needed, we can buy exactly what we want and expansion will not be a problem. Will definitely recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: skrap21

customer_reviews.title: Shipped Damaged?  Was sold as "in very good condition"
customer_reviews.text: I received the item two weeks late and then when I receive it in a damaged condition. The box includes three panels and each panel has four corners. Out of the 12 corners four were damaged. see picture. I had to bend with pliers to get it in reasonable shape to mount, and it's still a bit wonky. My bending had the unfortunate side effect of knocking off some of the enamelling, but all other things considered it's a minor issue. I would have shipped it back but not willing to wait another four to six weeks for a new item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bent Corners
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed in that two of the panels packaged together has bent corners, yet the carton they came in was perfectly fine with no sign of damage in transit, which tells me it was damaged at the plant. Very poor quality assurance. What can be a very good product with its apparent ease to install is spoiled by lack of inspection before packaging. The photo shows the difference between good corners and the bent ones.
customer_reviews.author: FP

customer_reviews.title: Great kit that fit my need sto a T.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Fit my needs exactly. WARNING, as stated in installation instructions, HANDLE WITH GLOVES. Very sharp edges including peg mounting slots. This kit is the perfect size for the space I installed it in. There's an outlet on the installation wall that I need access to so being able to hang one sheet on one side of the outlet and the other two opposite really worked out. Took a total of about a half hour to install after unboxing, checking contents and reading instructions. Mounting hardware included is grately appreciated and made the install a breeze. Great end result. The included accessories fit the kit well and is about all I would have use for in my space. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Enzo M.

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, well packaged. The only negative I have is that it came two days later then it was supposed to be. Some how out for delivery. Didn’t happen. So the help I had for the next day could not happen so I had to hang by myself made it a little more difficult. But all in all a great product. I will be buying more for my shed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty set!
customer_reviews.text: This is not your "old-school" peg board! This is HEAVY duty and will last a lifetime. It came with a nice variety of hooks and shelves. I was reorganizing my garage work bench and this was exactly what I needed. I did also purchase the aerosol can holder and love it just as much. When it arrived one of the plastic bins was cracked. I reached out to the manufacturer and they immediately sent me a replacement. Incredible customer service there. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Bent parts. (Not from shipping)
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed to find out so many parts are bent. The shipping box was in perfect condition so I can’t blame it on them. The picture is of a bent shelf and there are also several other pieces that wouldn’t fit into the peg board due to hooks curving. Too much of a hassle to take down and return so I guess I’ll hammer these and try to force them to work.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Langton

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just missing a shelf in my order..
customer_reviews.text: I received mine without the small shelf. Otherwise I love it, but parts missing is a no go. Being from small island in Hawai'i I didn't want to go through the hassle of a return so I just painted a shelf I had for another pegboard. Overall though, I love wall control. Great products I use for everything from my camera equipment, to my tools, to housekeeping
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my husband. Was pleasantly surprised at how big it really was! He loves them. Pretty much installed them instantly. Holds many many many tools! Holds lots of weight. Convenient to add shelves, baskets, hooks & more. Magnetic.
customer_reviews.author: D Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Check the corners!
customer_reviews.text: It’s good and it works but the corners were all damaged. The boxing was not damaged at all so I am sure it was a returned item repackaged or it comes out of the factory like this. Other than the damaged corners it’s fine. Check your corners before you open it all up... I can’t possibly package it and send it back... too much stuff.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Had a small dent but overall its excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love having this pegboard system now. I bought an extra panel as the 3 weren't enough. One of the panels had a small dent in the corner so I'll blame that on UPS. I was able to install it with no issues. And Its a rock solid investment for me, wish I had gotten it sooner. Got some more tools to hang, the hooks and shelves included with the kit are great.
customer_reviews.author: Micksta1962

customer_reviews.title: Great peg board, but came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Great peg board, but like most reviewers are stating - it came damaged. Really I think the problem is how they ship the product. I think it gets thrown around during shipping and there isn’t much padding to protect it. Multiple corners were bent when I revived the product. To be fair thought, this is metal and can be easily molded back to normal using a mallet or hammer. Took about 5 mins of molding it back and the rest was easy. 4 Stars, would do 5 if it didn’t come damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: All the pieces look amazing and fit very nicely except for the shelves with ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine came all banged up with the corners all bent. Had to fix that but that's UPS's fault, I didn't use the screws that came with the kit, opted for some 2 inch ones and washers to make sure it was really mounted into the studs. All the pieces look amazing and fit very nicely except for the shelves with the sides, I couldn't get them to line up nicely but wasn't a big issue for me. I would recommend buying extra accessories if you have a lot of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my husband!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this gift--it was exactly what he had been looking for. He loves organization, so this was great for his workbench area in the garage. The only setback was my own error, but since it happened to me (and I like to think of myself as a smart person), it could happen to someone else--the peg boards in this set are WHITE, not silver. That wasn't readily identifiable from the picture, and I found this set coming from the listing for the stainless steel pegboards only (without shelves/hooks/etc.). Otherwise, great product! They look really nice hanging in the garage, and they offer great organization for all of the little tools/screws/nails/etc. that make up a tool collection.
customer_reviews.author: raymey7

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect for my new workbench
customer_reviews.text: I moved my leather working setup to the garage and these were perfect. Everything is organized and easy to fine. The accessories are nearly unlimited. Happy organizing! This was not this cheapest route, but it wasn't much more expensive than normal fiber pegboard. This will last forever and never warp! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Best tool organizer
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to say how impressed I am with the quality of this metal pegboard organizer. Looks great, was easy to install, and easily supports all my tools. Ended up buying two sets. The hooks are metal and far superior to the plastic hooks supplied by others. MADE IN USA, and the quality speaks for itself. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lemans Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good price, easy to install and great for organization
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a good little wall system. It was relatively easy to install, but I would buy screw in wall anchors. Most of the included accessory items are useful, but I would have preferred a few more big hooks and less of the smaller ones. This wall system looks good, installs easy and manages to help you stay a bit more organized. I see myself getting a second kit of this type to double the capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett G. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The wall system looks great! The hooks for it even though they say they're locking, don't stay on the board as well as they should. Disappointing for the price. I bought cheaper 1 and 2 hole hooks with locking piece and they're better and cheaper. I expect companies that charge a premium price to provide a premium product.
customer_reviews.author: James A Balsham

customer_reviews.title: Missing half of the items listed in the description!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product at first, until I realized I did not receive half of the accessories that are listed in the description. I did receive the 2 shelves and the bins. I did not receive the bin hanger, screwdriver hanger, hammer hanger, and the 20 assorted hooks and brackets. If it wasn’t for that I would be purchasing more wall control now, but not going to take the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Luttrell

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for organizing a tool room. I ordered 2 of them and will probably order a couple more as they are perfect for setting up my tools on the wall and in easy reach easy see fashion as opposed to a drawer. I like the variety in the starter set that comes with the peg board.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product. Purchased white version with white accessories. Easy to install and looks great... as advertised! Still working with ideal tool arrangement and find that it is quite easy to make things work just as desired.. Also, kudos to Amazon and Romero T (for terrific) for straightening out an order mistake such that it arrived at my house in time for installation over the Memorial Day weekend - he really did a great job as manager of making this happen (very refreshing in today's world).!!
customer_reviews.author: William M Majors III

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes the board and is about to mount it in the basement. I'm looking forward to his tools having a home other than all over the place. He found it easy and quick to assemble on his own.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weir

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great material and the amount of things you can do with this is great. Didn’t put all three pieces next to each other so I can use the shelves and bins differently. Will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Joe Pigeon

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY PEGBOARD & HOOKS
customer_reviews.text: The pegboard was delivered on time and in good condition. They were easy to install by myself and a friend. There were plenty of hooks because I ordered an accessory kit to make sure. I believe that the accessories that come with the boards would be enough, I just wanted to fill the boards up (looking at the picture I provided- mission accomplished). I actually order 2 more boards for the selves that I purchased! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Don R.

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, Product arrived damaged. Corners were bent and Paint chipped off. It is disappointing but I will wait to see how customer service takes care of this issue before my product review. Two panels can be fixed and installed but I shouldn’t to have to go through this hassle. Other than the damage, the panels look sturdy and would be nice once installed.
customer_reviews.author: Rasonics

customer_reviews.title: Bought another one for my garage
customer_reviews.text: I brought one of these last year for my garage and it is nice to have your tools organized and displayed for you convenience. I had to buy another one cause I was expanding my workspace in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: SQ

customer_reviews.title: Great Way to store Tools.
customer_reviews.text: I din't have room for the entire unit in one place so split into 2, using 2 of the pieces in one room and another in a closet. Always wanted something like this but shied away because of the cost. Well worth the price & looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Number1

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for my workshop
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, exceptional value. Exactly as advertised. Great purchase for my workshop. Love the option of using slotted hooks or regular pegs. The ability to use pliers to adjust the slot pegs so that they are a tighter fit is awesome. Looking to purchase some more pegs soon. 1 yr. Update: These peg boards are still awesome. Just wish I had more wall space for another set for the rest of my clamps. May have to rethink were my drill press will go.
customer_reviews.author: Timohy Beach

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this item . Solid will last forever ... weird pricing ... realized you can get two panels of same size for about 60 dollars cheaper if you don’t get all of the mounting brackets with it
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Krause

customer_reviews.title: It's just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I had tools all over the house and when I needed something, I could never find it. This solved all my problems and the quality is awesome. I finally feel organized. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Layla.T

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Buy, Amazing Price! Use it for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: My Wall Control setup is 80% complete. In NYC space it at a minimum and kitchens can be tight. Sometimes you just have to go vertical. This is most often used for the garage but thanks to inspiration from one of my friends, I realized I can use it to free up some counter and cupboard space. I still have one more panel to put up and some chalk decorating to do but I must say I’m excited with how well this turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra LeVons

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, I use mine daily
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I use it in my home studio and it’s very useful for hanging cords, tools, all sorts of stuff. Regular peg board hooks do not work well for this though.
customer_reviews.author: Customer000

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I would have thought for being metal
customer_reviews.text: The sides arrived bent so the yellow cracked when I had to bend it back. Not as sturdy as I would have thought for being metal. Wasn't able to return since I didn't open them right away and return window passed.
customer_reviews.author: Ella S

customer_reviews.title: Great  addition to workshop area
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be awesome over my workbench. I bought my first one and was going to add a couple of panels extra. When I figured out the cost, the entire 3-panel set including the organization kit was a better buy so I bought the second set. Looking forward to getting everything ready to put this up soon. Very high quality and should last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Like Always but Better
customer_reviews.text: Tired of ripping out the holes in your pegboard made of a wood like product? This is the way to go for a great change. Best of all it is set up to use their specific "slotted" mounts or you can just transfer all of the standard pegboard mounts you already have and skip the others all together. This seems flimsy when you first take it out of the box but once you put it together and mount it on the wall, you'll see that it is strong and stable. The "Varity Pack" of mounts is a great start for a first time pegboard or a great addition to what you already have. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Furman O. Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and I was worried about the shipping damages to the corners! I had noises whatsoever!!! And all holes were at 16"!!! I had no problem installing!!! Thank You Wall Control, Bob
customer_reviews.author: Bob Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: looks amazing a well built. it is 16" offset studs, but all exterior walls by construction code should be 16" so there should never be any issues putting this in the garage. if there is, your house was not built to code.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie B.

customer_reviews.title: Holy COW these things are heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pegboards I've ever seen. one order is three separate panels. It is strong enough that I just installed it in a track so that I can slide them back and forth. Pretty sure that these things could support a full grown man if I wanted them to. The powder-coat finish is perfect, no flaws or light spots. The accessories that came with it look GREAT and are very robust. I'm going to buy more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought and it’s great. Made well, easy to put together and Made in the USA. Looks great and really helps keeping tools organized. And, just simply looks cool. Great product that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TPD

customer_reviews.title: Great for giving you you garage back.
customer_reviews.text: Second house we have purchased these for. My husband loves them. Great for getting you organized. Say good buy to the tool cabinet. Great for giving you you garage back. tool cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Much better than your typical peg board
customer_reviews.text: Much better than your typical peg board. But I was a little disappointed that their system of slotted "pegs" don't really lock in place any better than standard pegs. Oddly sometimes they will and it is great, but I think it just is a matter of paint thickness variation from piece to piece.
customer_reviews.author: Just Brett

customer_reviews.title: The product is great. I seldom write reviews
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 20 Wall Control panels, 5 Wall Control garage organizers, and 100s of hooks, shelves, etc. The product is great. I seldom write reviews, but decided to in this case. I had a minor issue with one of my orders. I called Wall Control, and they went way above to make the situation right. I will definitely buy again from them, and will highly recommend them to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with mine
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with mine. I like the fact that it's metal more than I thought because I'm using small magnets to hang some of my small tools. I bought the kit, which is great. I also bought a set of standard peg board pegs and they don't seem to work great on this board although I haven't tried to use them very hard because I don't really need them because the slot type hangers that came with the set work very well. Overall I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon H.

customer_reviews.title: convenient and good for organization
customer_reviews.text: Has 3 board, easy to assemble and mount on the wall. Used one for home office and two for workshop. Great for organizing the belongings
customer_reviews.author: CAO

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy install
customer_reviews.text: I've been really pleased with this kit. Good quality, nice finish on the powder coated parts. If you want a pegboard but want to be able to use shelves and support a lot of weight, this is a good way to go.
customer_reviews.author: MuzakTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Fits just right
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on my wall behind my husky 42in work bench. Good quality of material. All parts was included. Glad to have it and worth the price. Cheaper here then Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and keeps it organized
customer_reviews.text: Added four more panels and several accessories to complete the space. love the finished area, make it so much easier to stay organized.
customer_reviews.author: Ron richter

customer_reviews.title: Things were bent badly
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of the wall parts were bent real bad and could not straighten them up, finally threw them in the garbage....
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sweyd

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Finally installed mine this weekend. Mounted directly to concrete wall in basement with zero issues. One of the pieces was slightly bent during shipping but easily bent back into shape. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my board. Was going to get a wooden one, but decided that metal made more sense. Now I have a pegboard and magnetic board in one.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree King

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Product was pricey and you'll need to adhere to their ecosystem which costs much more but it's durable and will last for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Additional accessories are expensive and I learned the hard way ...
customer_reviews.text: Additional accessories are expensive and I learned the hard way that all plastic peg board hooks are not suitable for this metal pegboard. Not the products fault but something to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Chip F

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizers
customer_reviews.text: This is great. So happy I got this and got rid of the tool box. Now all is on wall and easily to find and organize b
customer_reviews.author: Steven King

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and thats not a bad thing! Shelves are the only thing that is difficult to remove and move around
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Must BUY
customer_reviews.text: Can never go wrong with a steel pegboard. Hefty, durable and sleek. Used this with some marbled contact paper and spray painted some of the hardware gold and it looks beyond perfect for all of my fashion needs.
customer_reviews.author: mvlipka

customer_reviews.title: High Quality but Proprietary
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and looks great! The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is that the accessories are quite expensive and are proprietary - they won't work on other peg boards. I also ordered the Wall Control 30-P-3232B and ordering 1 more set of 2 to finish my wall.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Sigler

customer_reviews.title: Pegboard on steroids!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product so far--quite sturdy, anchors firmly into drywall. Looks great and holds a ton of stuff.o
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and are working very well for organizing my ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 65 years young and had NO trouble installing these by myself. Great quality and are working very well for organizing my craft and sewing items! So nice to be able to arrange things so they're organized and in VIEW!!! LOVE THESE!!! Will buy more
customer_reviews.author: Denise - Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Came bent, no box damage
customer_reviews.text: The product came bent on the corners and I had to hammer it back into shape, which removed some of the paint.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great for a tool shop, work room, or garage. I've had it moved around a few times, no loss in integrity. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Benne

customer_reviews.title: I love the Wall Control organizers
customer_reviews.text: I love the Wall Control organizers! I've used these in three very different environments now, and I can say with confidence they are the sturdies and easiest to install pegboard I've ever used. Accessories feel firmly attached to the wall, especially if the available O-rings are used as well. Installation is very easy with just one person as well. I highly recommend this over other pegboard solutions.
customer_reviews.author: Thom Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love this metal peg board system. It has made my shop look fantastic. It is very sturdy and easy to use. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall system at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Simply awesome! I wanted something that would compliment my cabinets, was functional and sturdy. Found it! Cant go wrong with Wall Control I ended up buying 2 kits to cover the 8’ span. Still was cheaper than the big kit with all of the accessories I wouldn’t use. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Beyer

customer_reviews.title: This is why American made is better
customer_reviews.text: Not cheaply made. Rugged and well-constructed. Will last my lifetime and keep my tools organized. I prefer wall control panels to drawers because I can actually see my tools, whereas in a drawer you can't see it and it's less accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Scott O

customer_reviews.title: great item!! sturdy and made in USA
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a retired union carpenter and he is creating a workshop in our garage. I purchased this for him as an early birthday present. He just put it up in the garage and it looks great. Wonderful product, especially being a USA made product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to save a few dollars and decided to purchase the "used" kit. Well, the medal pegboards had a few bent corners but those were easily fixed. I didn't receive the majority of the accessories which sucked. The wasn't anything stating parts were missing. I got the 3 small bins and shelve dividers ony. Overall, the orange color looks good and probably would buy it again, at least the "new" one.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Galindo

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY What I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: This system is EXACTLY what I needed. I purchased the white pegboard with white shelves because it was significantly less expensive. This system is easy to install and well-made. The shelves are sturdy and the hooks lock in very well. All-in-all, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: They are of good quality and looks great; the hooks also can be adjusted to be more secure. Like that, you can get in different color to add some personal touch to garage.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge L. Reyes

product_meta.title: Pegboard Organizer Wall Control 4 ft. Metal Pegboard Standard Tool Storage Kit with Black Toolboard and Black Accessories
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe Wall Control Pegboard Standard Workbench Tool Storage Organizer Kit offers maximum tool board storage versatility and strength with over 10.5 square feet of pegboard storage space. Three 16in x 32in Black powder-coated pegboard panels combine for a total tool storage area of 48in x 32in which will accommodate many pegboard hooks. The attractive Metal Pegboards are great for heavy duty tool board storage needs due to their 20 gauge steel construction that will not warp, fray, or crack and are over 10 times stronger than conventional pegboard creating an industrial grade tool storage solution that will last a lifetime. Wall Control metal pegboards offer both slots and holes to accept slotted tool board accessories as well as conventional 1/4in peg board hooks making this pegboard extremely versatile by giving the user multiple options with tool board accessory selection. The patented engagement of the slotted tool board hooks included improves hook security for more hassle free tool storage. These versatile, durable, and high strength metal pegboard panels are an easy-to-use tool storage solution for any garage, shop, or tool crib. The metal pegboard panels are easy to install into studs or flat surfaces with pre-drilled mounting holes on 16in centers. A built-in frame return flange provides ample hook clearance and full access to all holes without requiring additional framework or using up pegboard holes for mounting. Mounting hardware is also included. Wall Control Pegboard Products are Made in the USA. The Metal Pegboard Standard Workbench Organizer Kit Includes: (3) Black Powder-Coated Metal Pegboard Panels 32 in. x 16 in. (Covers 48 in. x 32 in. when Installed), (1) 9 in. Shelf Assembly, (1) 6 in. Shelf Assembly, (3) Plastic Hanging Bins with Bin Hanger, (1) Screwdriver Holder, (1) Hammer Holder, Assortment of (20) Additional Hooks and Brackets. Mounting Hardware is Included. Black Pegboards with Black Tool board Accessories. Tools and Tool Sets Not Included.
feature_bullets: Wall Control metal pegboard is more than 10 times stronger than conventional pegboard
Pegboard accepts conventional 1/4in pegboard pegs and accessories
Pegboard accepts Wall Control slotted tool board pegs and accessories
Pegboard tool boards mount directly into studs or sheet rock with no framework required
Pegboard features an attractive, magnetic, and durable powder-coated finish

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,031 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
